name: PingBong
description:
is a circle multiplayer table tennis game

A unique twist to the digital table tennis game, where players can now team or play free for all whilst collecting power-ups to make them undefeatable. Move fast, just before the ball hits, to curve the ball into a different direction.

Features
  • Online multiplayer chaos
  • Teams
  • Achievements
  • Five different power-ups, including debuffs for the competing teams
  • Mobile support
Controls

Use your mouse or touch screen to move your paddle. Depending on where the ball hits your paddle, it'll bounce off. Move your paddle fast just before a hit to curve the trajectory of the ball.
